description:
Agenda below. Hosted and Sponsored by BJSS - [www.bjss.com](https://www.bjss.com/) \- a leading technology and engineering consultancy for business\.

Location: 90 Victoria St, Redcliffe, Bristol BS1 6DP

AGENDA

**18.00 – 18:20 Meet & Greet**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**18:20 - 19:10 Tracking database growth with Power BI** by **[Paul Mugleston](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mugleston/)**

Learn how to use Power BI to create a data model and visualisations that aid monitoring database instances; understanding database/table growth trends and get a better idea of your current usage trajectory.

Understanding this growth trajectory helps with planning future capacity, cost management and foreseeing issues rather than reacting.

**Bio:**
I’m an experienced data professional currently working in the healthcare sector. I have spent 20 years working in the data industry and specialise in leveraging data insights to drive efficiency and innovation.

Proficient in the Microsoft BI stack and Power BI, I am committed to improving data management practices to enhance patient care and organisational effectiveness.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**19:10 - 19:40 Pizza and Networking**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**19:40 - 20:30 Happy Birthday, Microsoft Fabric!** by **[Laura-Jayne Adamson](https://www.linkedin.com/in/laurajayneadamson/)**

Join me as we take a look back through the first year of Microsoft Fabric! Celebrating the major milestones we have achieved, and what we can expect to come over the next few years. I will share some of my tips for using the Fabric platform I have picked up along the journey since May 2023.

**Bio:**
I have been a Data Engineer at Purple Frog Systems for the last year, focussing primarily on the Microsoft Fabric Platform. As a mum of one, I use my experiences throughout motherhood to give an engaging perspective on presentations in a way that is relatable for most people. A proud woman in STEM hoping to break stereotypes and inspire more women to go for their dreams.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**20:30 - Pub**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-
**About BJSS - [https://www.bjss.com/](https://www.bjss.com/)**

BJSS is a leading technology and engineering consultancy for business. Trusted by our clients, we collaborate with some of the world’s leading organisations to deliver complex, innovative technology, engineering, and industry solutions that millions of people use every day.

**\-\-\-\-**
**Photos**
*We ask that you do NOT take photos at this meetup.*

We will invite people to be included in a group photo/s during the event. Speakers will let you know if it's okay to photograph their presentation (excluding other attendees).

You may see organisers taking photos during the talks. These will be of speakers, if they have agreed to this, and will not include faces of attendees.
title: Power BI and Fabric
